name: Cookie Hangman
description: Embark on a delightful word-guessing adventure, where you must unravel hidden words

name: Tiny-Fishing
description: Tiny Fishing is a fun fishing game where you draw your line and hook as many fish as possible.

name: Survival Craft Adventure.
description: This is a 2D-pixel game where you must gather resources, craft, and build in order to survive.

name: Emoji Puzzle
description: A unique game featuring various puzzles based on emojis. Explore the creative and emotional fun between the emojis we use daily.

name: Pee Wee’s Archery Adventure
description: You’ll need steady aim to hit the targets in this challenging archery game.

name: Jewel Monsters
description: World Geography: Flags and Capitals is an educational geography trivia quiz game that tests your geography knowledge!

name: Camping Crush
description: Beat the countdown in our fun new matching game.
